snippet: The ruling also ordered the military not to destroy videotapes showing previous force-feeding of the detainee, who is on a hunger strike.
abstract: Federal Judge Gladys Kessler orders the military to stop force-feeding Jihad Ahmed Mujstafa Diyab, a hunger-striking detainee at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba; in order, first of its kind, Kessler also orders military not to destroy videotapes showing previous force-feeding of Diyab.
lead_paragraph: The ruling also ordered the military not to destroy videotapes showing previous force-feeding of the detainee, who is on a hunger strike.

headline.main: Judge Orders U.S. to Stop Force-Feeding Syrian Held at Guantánamo
headline.print_headline: Military Ordered to Stop Force-Feeding Detainee
